name: Toon Gladiator Beasts
author: Brenduke
notes:
Been testing various builds and different backrow options and this is the build I git KoG with. Very close to theorised build from my intro guide in #geargia. Only card I would change is econ for chalice/canadia.

This build plays exactly like GB and I love it. I highly recommend to my GB brethren to try this out.
